BY AROCHA
CRAZE
NINETEEN NINETY

CRAZE

I’ll take a one way ticket back to the 90s by presenting 4 style of fashion and cool things which make it’s the decade that never ended.
Overview of this decade. As the 20th century came to a close, fashion reached its most casual. Both men and women adopted grunge fashion in the early part of the decade and loose, oversized clothing and jeans became staples.
CASUAL. DRESS. GRUNGE. PLAID. CASUAL. DRESS. GRUNGE. PLAID.
PLAID. CASUAL. DRESS. GRUNGE. PLAID. CASUAL. DRESS. GRUNGE.
B A C K
I N
T O
1990S
OVERSIZED SWEATER
BAGGY JEANS
SNEAKER
“ It was born of a desire to not engage with fashion at all.”
CASUAL
In the 1990s fashion became more and more casual. Jeans and oversize sweater became typical casualwear as trends in music like grunge, hip-hop and Britpop influenced styles throughout the decade.
Discman
When the Sony Discman made CDs portable in the '90s, it was like the future had finally arrived. Sure, the music skipped whenever the Discman was even slightly jostled, but it was still a huge revelation.
SLIP DRESS
“ In the mid-nineties, styles became more feminine again.”
DRESS
Slip dresses epitomized the minimalist look during this period. Silky versions were worn as formalwear while a popular daytime look was a slip dress over a white t-shirt.
Tamagotchi
Raise an adorable pet alive in your pocket. Tamagotchis were so addictive among kids in the '90s that some schools actually banned them because students would skip class to "feed" their handheld digital pets.
Baggy Jeans
flannel shirts
Dr. Martens boots
“ The desire for vintage clothing encouraged the spread of second-hand clothing stores”
GRUNGE
Second-hand clothing stores which were also used for the grunge fashion. it was a widespread look that was based on everyday clothing such as baggy jeans, flannel shirts and Doc Martens boots
Bart Simpsons
Bart Simpson "Eat My Shorts" T-shirt was an act of rebellious defiance. Even the bootleg versions, with badly drawn caricatures of Bart and his family, were a symbol of counterculture that gave you street in the '90s.
plaid clothes
high socks
marry jane shoes
“ The sexy schoolgirl look as seen in movies like Clueless”
PLAID
If you wanted to dress like Alicia Silverstone in Clueless, you likely had at least a few outfits in your wardrobe that were plaid. It's the one look that everybody in the '90s, regardless of their personal aesthetics, could agree on.
Clueless
The movie that create the lifestyle bible of the 90s teenager which illustrate that they were full with determination and they want to be loved by their friends.These thing carry on to each generation of teenagers.

CRAZE

CRAZE is a personal passion project during
internship with 5labs. Made for celebrating the iconic 90s fashion through an visual design piece.

Design & Developement

Arocha Tippayakrisorn
